description: It looked like simple paint program resembling MS Paint in functionality. But you cannot draw line from point A to point B, for some reason, it doesn't register small movements of mouse cursor, so depending on the speed of your mouse swings, the line will not reach point B. But UI offers the possibility to turn sound on/off. I think this pretty much sums it up.
summary: does not meet even the lowest standard for anything

description: The lack of a normal UI makes it even impossible for me to understand immediately how to open an image file. All i wanted is an app that resizes and saves a quality changed jpg photo.
If you manage to find the 'open file' button, it will not show .jpg or .png files.
Terrible UI, I would not use this program.
LA COSA MAS HORRIBLE KE E VISTO EN TODA MI VIDA. TE ROBA LA INFORMACION, TE HACKEAN Y POR ULTIMO TE ROBAN TU NOVIA AHHHHHHHHH
